input.rewritten_query: 查询22级计科一班成绩趋势

sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT score.term, score.score_value FROM class JOIN student ON class.id = student.class_id JOIN enroll ON student.id = enroll.student_id JOIN score ON enroll.course_class_id = score.course_class_id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '计科一班' AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND enroll.status = '已选' AND enroll.is_deleted = 0 AND score.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.term, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score_value FROM base GROUP BY base.term ORDER BY base.term

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”及常见问法“22级”映射为数值 2022
根据字段描述“班级名称，班级实体映射主字段”直接精确匹配
